2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body:
> [basxto](#comment_10_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k): I need to find a way sperate zeronet and clearnet, some people also embedd images from regular websites â€¦ that's stupid

Use Tor Browser then clearnet requests go over Tor. Or change the network settings in your browser so 'localhost,127.0.0.1' only work and the rest are denied. You can do this in Firefox by setting up a proxy that does not exist (ie. on a port you have nothing running on) but have localhost excluded.
